alert.note: Alert for Centre; Clinton (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 16 at 10:55AM EDT until May 16 at 11:45AM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Centre County in central Pennsylvania... Clinton County in north central Pennsylvania... * Until 1145 AM EDT. * At 1054 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Keating, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Keating, Renovo, South Renovo, Monument, Westport, Glen Union, Tamarack, Kettle Creek State Park, Hyner and Orviston. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
